feed.title: Fladder Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Fladder: v0.3.1
entry.content:
Small bugfix release for desktop. And translations update for all platforms.

What's Changed

Exciting New Features üèï

  • feature(Desktop): Added seek indicator by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/80

Bugfixes üêû

  • fix: Keyboard controls and translations by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/79

Other Changes

  • chore: Updated translations from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/76
  • chore: automate releases by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/81

Full Changelog: https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/compare/v0.3.0...v0.3.1

entry.title: New release for Fladder: v0.4.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Small bug in 0.4.0 so skipped to 0.4.1

Exciting New Features üèï

  • feature: Auto next-up preview, skip to next in queue. by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/96
  • feature: Added playback rate to video player options by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/99
  • feature(Lock-screen): Replaced login button with a floating action button by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/103
  • feature: Added option to save and set default filters for libraries by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/107
  • feature: Added settings to force the player into certain orientations by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/108
  • feature: Adds schemeVariants to color options by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/109
  • feature: Toggle wifi requirement for downloads by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/110
  • feature(Library): Use dialog to ask what to play by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/111

Bugfixes üêû

  • fix(macOS): Add appropriate padding to navigation rail on macOS by @emilymclean in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/94
  • fix: Video player - Use theme to get the correct text color by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/98
  • fix: small alignment issue media banner buttons by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/97
  • fix: Playback not cancelling if no compatible media was found by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/100
  • fix: Improve keyboard input handling by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/102
  • fix: Unable to log-out user with incorrect token by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/104

Other Changes

  • chore: Updated translations from Hosted Weblate by @weblate
  • chore: improved dart analyzer by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/82

New Contributors

  • @emilymclean made their first contribution in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/94

Full Changelog: https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/compare/v0.3.1...v0.4.1

entry.title: New release for Fladder: v0.4.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

Small bugfixes here and there. This release also includes a small change to please the google overlords from rejecting the app.

Exciting New Features üèï

  • feat: Improve how unsupported items are shown. by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/129

Bugfixes üêû

  • bugfix: Fix sending NowPlayingQueue in progress reports by @lmgarret in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/126
  • fix(Desktop): Fixed some of desktop specific controls by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/131

Other Changes

  • Clarify README by @bazzadazza72 in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/124
  • chore: Renaming of Trickplay -> TrickPlay and other cleanups by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/130
  • chore: Updated translations from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/119

New Contributors

  • @lmgarret made their first contribution in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/126

Full Changelog: https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/compare/v0.4.1...v0.4.2

entry.title: New release for Fladder: v0.4.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bugfixes üêû

  • bugfix: Only allow add to collection for admins by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/133
  • fix: duration-picker not working by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/134

Full Changelog: https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/compare/v0.4.2...v0.4.3

entry.title: New release for Fladder: v0.4.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

This release includs flatpak for ease of use on more linux distro's üéâ! Fladder now has a new icon

Exciting New Features üèï

  • feature: Add support for mediaSegments by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/138
  • feature: Added new icon by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/144
  • feat(Linux): Automatically build a Flatpak bundle by @lmgarret in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/125
  • feature: Improved video player stop controls by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/146

Bugfixes üêû

  • fix: Fixed season sorting episode view by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/135
  • fix: specials being shown in season views by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/136
  • bugfix: Fixed all library types being sorted as Movies by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/145

Other Changes

  • chore: Add installation and usage instructions by @bazzadazza72 in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/141
  • chore: Updated translations from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/137

Full Changelog: https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/compare/v0.4.3...v0.4.4
